verses.John 3:16: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.John 1:1: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
verses.John 14:6: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
verses.Romans 3:23: For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God;
verses.Romans 6:23: For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
verses.Romans 10:9: That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus, and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead, thou shalt be saved.
verses.1 John 4:2: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God:
verses.1 John 4:3: And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God: and this is that spirit of antichrist, whereof ye have heard that it should come; and even now already is it in the world.
verses.Isaiah 8:20: To the law and to the testimony: if they speak not according to this word, it is because there is no light in them.
verses.Galatians 1:8: But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.
verses.2 Corinthians 11:14: And no marvel; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light.
